documentation.text:
@title ERC20 Proxy contract.
 @dev Manages ERC20 tokens using the Webaverse signing oracle for validation and cross-chain transfer

arguments.value: new signer can only be set by old signer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "new signer can only be set by old signer"

 @param newSigner Address of the new signer

 @param newParent Address of parent contract

attributes.text:
@title ERC20 Proxy contract.
 @dev Manages ERC20 tokens using the Webaverse signing oracle for validation and cross-chain transfer

@dev Set the address for the signer oracle
 @param newSigner Address of the new signer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "new signer can only be set by old signer"

attributes.type: literal_string "new signer can only be set by old signer"
attributes.value: new signer can only be set by old signer

attributes.text:
@dev Set the parent contract that this proxy manages
 @param newParent Address of parent contract

devdoc.details: Manages ERC20 tokens using the Webaverse signing oracle for validation and cross-chain transfer

Deposited(address,uint256).details: Used by the oracle when signing

Withdrew(address,uint256,uint256).details: Log the fact that we withdrew oracle-signed fungible tokens

constructor.details: Construct the proxy with a managed parent and chain ID

params._chainId: Chain ID this contract is attached to Default parent address: 0xd7523103ba15c1dfcf0f5ea1c553bc18179ac656 Default signer address: 0xfa80e7480e9c42a9241e16d6c1e7518c1b1757e4
params.parentAddress: Address of the managed ERC20 contract

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposit ERC20 tokens to an address

params.to: Address to deposit to Example is 0x08E242bB06D85073e69222aF8273af419d19E4f6

setERC20Parent(address).details: Set the parent contract that this proxy manages

setSigner(address).details: Set the address for the signer oracle

withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32.details: Withdraw ERC20 tokens to an address

params.to: Address to withdraw to Example is 0x08E242bB06D85073e69222aF8273af419d19E4f6
params.v: Recovery ID Example is 0x1c Example args: 0x08E242bB06D85073e69222aF8273af419d19E4f6, 1, 10, 0xc336b0bb5cac4584d79e77b1680ab789171ebc95f44f68bb1cc0a7b1174058ad, 0x72b888e952c0c39a8054f2b6dc41df645f5d4dc3d9cc6118535d88aa34945440, 0x1c

withdrawNonceUsed(address,uint256,uint25.details: Check if the nonce has been used

params.to: Address to deposit to Example is 0x08E242bB06D85073e69222aF8273af419d19E4f6

returns._0: true if the nonce has been used

devdoc.title: ERC20 Proxy contract.
